titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Hexythiazox Technical.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Hexythiazox Technical.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on trans-5-(4-Chlorophenyl)-N-cyclohexyl-4-methyl-2-oxothiazolidine-3-carboxamide (Hexythiazox Technical).
